title: Topic 004 Question 009
body: You plan to automate the deployment of a virtual machine scale set that uses the Windows Server 2016 Datacenter image.
You need to ensure that when the scale set virtual machines are provisioned, they have web server components installed.
Which two actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: Modify the extensionProfile section of the Azure Resource Manager template
Create a new virtual machine scale set in the Azure portal
